servinfo.title: Malfunction Indicator Lamp (MIL) Check
servinfo.ptxt: Malfunction indicator lamp (1) signals an antipollution system failure.
Check that it turns ON after the ignition switch is turned ON without engine running, and then it turns OFF (after starting engine).
If MIL remains ON after starting engine, go to DTC Check:F9Q .
After the ignition switch is turned ON, if MIL does not turns ON, check that MIL circuit.
